Name: LinkAddedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a link is added to the diagram.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> that was added.

Name: LinkClickedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when an <c>@onclick</c> event occurs on a link.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.MouseEventArgs" />.

Name: LinkDoubleClickedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when an <c>@ondblclick</c> event occurs on a link.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.MouseEventArgs" />.

Name: LinkPointerDownEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer (e.g., mouse or touch) is pressed down on a link.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.PointerEventArgs" />.

Name: LinkPointerEnterEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer enters the bounds of a link.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.PointerEventArgs" />.

Name: LinkPointerLeaveEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer leaves the bounds of a link.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.PointerEventArgs" />.

Name: LinkPointerMoveEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer moves over a link.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.PointerEventArgs" />.

Name: LinkPointerUpEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer is released from a link.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.PointerEventArgs" />.

Name: LinkRedrawEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a redraw is manually requested for a link.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> that requested the redraw.

Name: LinkRemovedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a link is removed from the diagram.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> that was removed.

Name: LinkSelectionChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the selection state of a link changes (e.g., selected or deselected).

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> whose selection state changed.

Name: LinkSizeChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the size (width or height) of a link changes.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> whose size changed.

Parameters.Name: OldWidth
Parameters.Documentation: The previous width value.

Parameters.Name: OldHeight
Parameters.Documentation: The previous height value.

Parameters.Name: NewWidth
Parameters.Documentation: The new width value.

Parameters.Name: NewHeight
Parameters.Documentation: The new height value.

Name: LinkSourcePortChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the source port of a link is changed to a different port.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> whose source port changed.

Parameters.Name: OldSourcePort
Parameters.Documentation: The previous <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Ports.IPort" /> the link was connected to.

Parameters.Name: NewSourcePort
Parameters.Documentation: The new <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Ports.IPort" /> the link is now connected to.

Name: LinkTargetPortChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the target port of a link is changed.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> whose target port changed.

Parameters.Name: OldTargetPort
Parameters.Documentation: The previous <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Ports.IPort" /> the link was connected to (can be null).

Parameters.Name: NewTargetPort
Parameters.Documentation: The new <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Ports.IPort" /> the link is now connected to (can be null).

Name: LinkTargetPositionChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the target position of a link changes. This is typically only used for in-progress or temporary links.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> whose target position changed.

Parameters.Name: OldX
Parameters.Documentation: The old X position of the target point.

Parameters.Name: OldY
Parameters.Documentation: The old Y position of the target point.

Parameters.Name: TargetPositionX
Parameters.Documentation: The new X position of the target point.

Parameters.Name: TargetPositionY
Parameters.Documentation: The new Y position of the target point.

Name: LinkVisibilityChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the visibility state of a link changes.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> whose visibility state changed.

Name: LinkWheelEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the mouse wheel is scrolled while over a link.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.WheelEventArgs" />.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Links.ILink" /> that triggered the event.
